Getting Started with Meowzer #

Welcome! This guide will help you get up and running with Meowzer quickly.

Learning Path #

Follow these pages in order for the best experience:

1. Introduction #

What is Meowzer?

Learn what Meowzer is, what it can do, and how the pieces fit together.

Time: 5 minutes

2. Installation #

Install Meowzer

Set up Meowzer in your project using npm, yarn, or pnpm.

Time: 5 minutes

3. Quick Start #

Your First Cat in 5 Minutes

Create and place your first autonomous cat with minimal code.

Time: 5 minutes

4. First Cat Tutorial #

Detailed Walkthrough

Build a complete example step-by-step with explanations.

Time: 20 minutes

Already Experienced? #

Skip ahead to what you need:

  • Concepts - Deep dive into architecture and systems
  • Tutorials - Build real projects
  • API Reference - Complete API documentation
  • Examples - Ready-to-use code snippets
